name: statch
description: Tickets manager, bug tracker, open source
author: Half Square

scripts.setup:server: npm i --prefix src/server && grunt copy:env && cd src/server && npx prisma migrate deploy src/server && npx prisma generate && cd ../..
scripts.setup: npm i --prefix src/client && npm run setup:server
scripts.start:dist: npm run build:full && cd ./dist && npm i && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx prisma generate && node main.js
scripts.build:full: npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run pack
